name: The Light Salon Boost LED Collar
product_description: Salon technology at-home. Backed by 15 years of experience in LED. The portable Boost LED Collar can be used alongside the Boost Mask to hydrate, nourish and soothe the skin on areas of the face, neck and dècolletage. all_ingreds: Clinically proven to improve the tone, texture and elasticity of the skin. Collagen and elastin production, and tissue oxygenation increase with regular use. The Collar’s clinically-proven wavelengths also relax the muscles and improve circulation for a feeling of deep calm. Wavelength Call Out Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction. Shorter wavelengths such as green, yellow and purple penetrate poorly and are absorbed by melanin and superficial blood. They will not reach the dermis where the main cells for healing and rejuvenation are located, and therefore will not stimulate the production of collagen and elastin.

product_description: Powered by next-generation retinoid active, Granactive Retinoid and naturally derived retinol alternative Bakuchiol along with a blend 37 botanical extracts Black Tulip Overnight Retinoid Serum, helps to promote skin turnover and reduce fine lines and wrinkles while sealing in hydration without redness or irritation.
all_ingreds:
BLACK TULIP COMPLEX:

                          Powered by sustainably upcycled petals from the deepest, darkest tulip, this antioxidant-rich, youth restoring complex helps hydrate, smooth, and tighten the skin for instant visible results with long term clinical-grade benefits

                          
                          	Niacinamide: A skin-soothing antioxidant that improves uneven skin tone, minimizes the appearance of fine lines, pores and wrinkles, brightens dullness and strengthens the skin’s barrier.
                          	Granactive Retinoid: A next-generation, effective alternative to retinol and other forms of non-prescription retinoid that hydrates and plumps skin while helping to improve firmness and elasticity without irritation. Clinically shown to reduce fine lines & wrinkles by 60% at 14 days Clinically shown to reduce visual age spots by 50% at 28 days
                          	Bakuchiol: Naturally derived retinol alternative that seals in hydration, helps reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and discoloration and increases skin’s elasticity and firmness. Clinically shown to reduce wrinkle depth and skin roughness by over 20%.
                          	Hemp Seed Oil Complex: A powerful calming and repairing phyto complex featuring a nanoemulsion of organic hemp seed oil and Swiss stone pine extract to help improve skin’s tone and texture. Clinically shown to reduce the number of wrinkles by 28% at day 28
                          	Lingonberry Stem Cells: A“superfruit” rich in vitamins C & E and polyphenols to help reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone, spots and wrinkles while improving skin’s moisture, firmness and elasticity. Clinically shown to decrease the number of wrinkles by 35% at day 28
                          	Saponaria Pumila Stem Cells: Helps to improve skin’s firmness and elasticity while protecting against UV rays. Clinically shown to improve skin elasticity & firmness by over 14% at day 28
                          	Centella Asiatica Extract (Tiger Grass): A medicinal herb with antioxidant properties that soothes inflammation, strengthens skin’s barrier, and promotes collagen production to increase skin’s firmness.
                          	Distilled Candeia Oil (Bisabolol): A natural skin conditioner known for its anti-irritant, anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial properties to calm and soothe skin while keeping it supple, firm, and hydrated.
                          	Sea Fennel Stem Cells: A bio-marine-sourced extract rich in Vitamins A+C proven to help balance out skin coloration and tone while boosting production of elastin and collagen and promoting healthy cell renewal.
                          	Vitamin E: A powerful skin-nourishing antioxidant that works to protect the skin from environmental damage and helps to strengthen skin’s barrier function.
                          	Hyaluronic Acid: A deeply hydrating ingredient and natural humectant proven to draw in moisture to smooth, firm, and plump the skin. It is known to be able to hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water.
                          	Malic Acid & Lactic Acid: Gentle AHAs that exfoliate and promote youthful skin without irritation.
                          	Aloe Leaf Extract: Helps stimulate the skin’s natural production of hyaluronic acid for plumper, more hydrated skin.
                          	Olive Oil: Rich in antioxidants, fatty acids, and squalene to moisturize, hydrate and protect skin against environmental damage and inflammation while preventing signs of premature aging

name: Bloomeffects Black Tulip Eye Treatment 15ml
product_description: A hydrating gel texture that is packed with a potent combination of Squalane, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, Red Algae extract and Azelaic Acid to replenish moisture while smoothing and plumping skin for a restored healthy and youthful glow.
all_ingreds:
BLACK TULIP COMPLEX:

                          Powered by sustainably upcycled petals from the deepest, darkest tulip, this antioxidant-rich, youth restoring complex helps hydrate, smooth, and tighten the skin for instant visible results with long term clinical-grade benefits

                          
                          	Orchid Stem Cells: Clinically proven to improve skin firmness and elasticity while reducing wrinkles and restoring a youthful glow.
                          	Saponaria Pumila Stem Cells: Helps to improve skin’s firmness and elasticity while protecting against UV rays.
                          	Rosemary Leaf Extract + Peptide Complex: A reviving complex with antioxidant effects that helps reduce dark circles and eye puffiness while improving skin tone and elasticity and reducing fine lines. It works to restore radiance and moisture to the skin while helping to protect against the damaging effects of blue light. Clinically shown to reduce surface of deep wrinkles by 27.7% at 2 months
                          	Squalane: A humectant derived from plant-sugar works to seal in moisture and keep skin hydrated while helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Azelaic Acid: Helps exfoliate, reduce inflammation, and smooth skin's surface while working to diminish the appearance of blemishes and discoloration revealing a more even skin tone.
                          	Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): A skin-soothing antioxidant that improves uneven skin tone, minimizes the appearance of fine lines, pores and wrinkles, brightens dullness and strengthens the skin's barrier.
                          	Sodium PCA: An effective humectant that helps plump and restores skin and reduce inflammation while helping to prevent signs of aging.
                          	Red Algae Extract: Rich in natural polysaccharides to enhance skin's barrier function helping to replenish skin’s natural moisture and improve hydration.
                          	Caffeine: Works to reduce inflammation, puffiness and wrinkles while tightening and brightening the skin.
                          	Phytic Acid: A mild AHA that gently exfoliates skin to reduce the appearance of signs of aging.
                          	Cucumber Seed Oil: Rich in omega-6 fatty acids and vitamins to help detoxify the skin while restoring moisture and encouraging skin regeneration and restoration.
                          	Distilled Candeia Oil (Bisabolol): A natural skin conditioner known for its anti irritant, anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial properties to calm and soothe skin while keeping it supple, firm, and hydrated.
                          	Sea Fennel Stem Cells: A bio-marine-sourced extract rich in Vitamins A+C proven to help balance out skin coloration and tone while boosting production of elastin and collagen and promoting healthy cell renewal.
                          	Hyaluronic Acid: A deeply hydrating ingredient and natural humectant proven to draw in moisture to smooth, firm, and plump the skin. It is known to be able to hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water.
                          	Olive Oil: Rich in antioxidants, fatty acids, and squalene to moisturize, hydrate and protect skin against environmental damage and inflammation while preventing signs of premature aging.
                          	Vitamin E: A powerful skin-nourishing antioxidant that works to protect the skin from environmental damage and helps to strengthen skin's barrier function.

BLACK TULIP COMPLEX:

                          Powered by sustainably upcycled petals from the deepest, darkest tulip, this antioxidant-rich, youth restoring complex helps hydrate, smooth, and tighten the skin for instant visible results with long term clinical-grade benefits

                          
                          	Squalane: A humectant derived from plant sugar works to seal in moisture and keep skin hydrated while helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Clinically shown to reduce appearance of wrinkles by 51% at 28 days.
                          	Orchid Stem Cells: Clinically proven to improve skin firmness and elasticity while reducing wrinkles and restoring a youthful glow.
                          	Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): A skin-soothing antioxidant that improves uneven skin tone, minimizes the appearance of fine lines, pores, and wrinkles, brightens dullness, and strengthens the skin's barrier.
                          	Peptides: Amino acids that help boost collagen to plump skin and smooth fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Saponaria Pumila Stem Cells: Helps to improve skin's firmness and elasticity while protecting against UV rays.
                          	Pomegranate Enzyme: Provides gentle exfoliation helping to brighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Ceramide NP: Replenishes and restores skin's barrier to maintain moisture balance, improve visible signs of aging, and protect against environmental damage.
                          	Sodium Hyaluronate: A water-soluble salt derived from hyaluronic acid that retains moisture while replenishing and plumping skin to improve fine lines and wrinkles.
                          	Sodium PCA: An effective humectant that helps plump and restores skin and reduce inflammation while helping to prevent signs of aging.
                          	Malic Acid & Lactic Acid: Gentle AHAs that exfoliate and promote youthful skin without irritation.
                          	Aloe Leaf Extract: A deeply hydrating humectant that helps promote the skin's natural production of hyaluronic acid for plumper, more hydrated skin
                          	Gluconolactone: A poly-hydroxy acid (PHA) that gently exfoliates and hydrates the skin improving tone and texture for a smoother, brighter complexion.
                          	Oil blend (including Olive, Apricot Kernel, Baobab, Acai, Moringa, Sunflower Seed): Rich in omega fatty acids and antioxidants to nourish, soothe and protect the skin while helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and blemishes
                          	Gardenia Flower Extract: Antioxidant with a high concentration of flavonoids and ferulic acid to help smooth, plump and brighten skin while protecting against environmental damage.
                          	Colloidal Oatmeal: Helps calm and soothe dry or irritated skin
                          	Cloudberry Seed: High in Vitamin C and rich in Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids to help brighten and protect from free radical damage while helping to strengthen skin's protective barrier.
                          	Vitamin E: A powerful skin-nourishing antioxidant that works to protect the skin from environmental damage and helps to strengthen skin's barrier function

product_description: Through relentless research and technical innovation, RéVive helps give skin the ability to renew, refresh and appear more youthful. all_ingreds:
Wavelength Call Out:
                          Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction.
                          Shorter wavelengths such as green, yellow and purple penetrate poorly and are absorbed by melanin and superficial blood. They will not reach the dermis where the main cells for healing and rejuvenation are located, and therefore will not stimulate the production of collagen and elastin. 
                          Longer wavelengths such as red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm penetrate well into the skin and reach the dermis – not only do they stimulate collagen and elastin production (rejuvenating the complexion), they also penetrate deep into the body, reaching muscles, nerves and bone, increasing blood flow and targeting inflammation whilst supporting cellular regrowth and regeneration to help reduce pain and heal injuries.

name: Holifrog Owel Multi-Peptide Eye Cream 0.5 fl. oz
product_description: HoliFrog's Owel Multi-Peptide Eye Cream's balanced combination of buttery plant-based emollients and lightweight botanical seed oils deliver nourishing moisture to your delicate under-eye area. This formula is also loaded up with amino acid complexes, antioxidants, and powerful peptides with proven abilities to smooth fine lines and wrinkles, boost collagen and elastin production, and prevent the degradation of existing collagen over time. Not bad for a tiny jar.
all_ingreds:
Key Ingredients:

                          Acetyl Hexapeptide-8: Also known as Argireline and acetyl hexapeptide-3, this neurotransmitter-inhibiting peptide targets expression wrinkles similar to the way Botox does. This peptide has the ability to significantly decrease wrinkle depth and width while increasing moisturization.

                          4% Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate (Syn-Ake): This synthetic tripeptide's small molecular weight allows it to penetrate skin easily. A triple amino acid complex targets wrinkles caused by facial movement (again, similar to Botox).

                          2% Copper Lysinate/Prolinate (Neodermyl®): An essential amino acid- mineral complex shown to boost the skin’s own collagen and elastin production. Neodermyl is a pure source of bio-energy, allowing it to naturally diffuse into skin to re-energize senescent fibroblasts and trigger production of collagen and elastin.

                          Mango Seed Butter: A fatty acid-rich plant-based emollient and a key vehicle for buttery, skin-soothing hydration in our formula.

                          Lupinus Albus (White Lupine) Seed Oil: A non-fragrant plant oil containing a powerful trio of omegas 3, 6, and 9. These unsaturated fatty acids keep skin well-moisturized, strengthened, and calm.

                          Poria Cocos Extract: This mushroom-derived extract has antioxidant and skin-soothing powers.

                          Nephelium Lappaceum Peel Extract: This extract is derived from the outer layers of the rambutan fruit, a tree native to Southeast Asia. The outer peel of the fruit is rich in antioxidants and polyphenol compounds, which help protect and strengthen the skin barrier from oxidative stress.

                          3% Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract: This extract from Hawaiian white ginger (or butterfly ginger) acts as a multiprotector for skin exposed to blue light, UV, and environmental pollution.

                          2% Ziziphus Spina-Christi Leaf: The leaves from Christ's thorn plant are used to create an extract (professionally known as GlowAGETM), which is proven to improve wrinkle depth and volume, smooth the eye area, and reduce collagen fragmentation in this concentration.

                          1% Argania Spinosa Callus Culture Extract: This plant stem cell derivative (also known as PhytoCellTecTM) comes from the argan tree and has proven capabilities for dermal stem cell protection, improving skin firmness and tightness, and anti-wrinkle effects on fine lines.

                          1% Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Seed Extract: This extract contains saponins, which can help reduce swelling and puffiness with anti- inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

                          Coffea Arabica Seed Oil: A non-fragrant plant oil that helps skin bolster its moisture retention.

                          Trehalose: This water-binding plant sugar acts as a humectant, drawing hydration to skin to support moisture retention.

                          Water (Aqua) (Eau), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Candelilla/Jojoba/Rice Bran Polyglyceryl-3 Esters, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Bu􏰿er, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Trehalose, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, C15-19 Alkane, Lupinus Albus Seed Oil, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Copper Lysinate/Prolinate, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Hedychium Coro- narium Root Extract, Nephelium Lappaceum Leaf Extract, Ziziphus Spina-Christi Leaf Extract, Argania Spinosa Callus Culture Extract, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Seed Extract, Lecithin, Isoamyl Cocoate, Isomalt, Isoamyl Laurate, Maltodextrin, Xanthan Gum, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Methylglucoside Phosphate, Sucrose, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid

all_ingreds:
Wavelength Call Out:
                          Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction.
                          Shorter wavelengths such as green, yellow and purple penetrate poorly and are absorbed by melanin and superficial blood. They will not reach the dermis where the main cells for healing and rejuvenation are located, and therefore will not stimulate the production of collagen and elastin.
                          Longer wavelengths such as red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm penetrate well into the skin and reach the dermis – not only do they stimulate collagen and elastin production (rejuvenating the complexion), they also penetrate deep into the body, reaching muscles, nerves and bone, increasing blood flow and targeting inflammation whilst supporting cellular regrowth and regeneration to help reduce pain and heal injuries.

product_description: Made to medical device directives, our portable Mask delivers the same clinically-proven wavelengths as our prestigious professional salon machines. Salon technology at-home. The Boost LED Mask gives you a salon-grade LED treatment in the comfortable surroundings of home. With regular 10-minute treatments, skin is plumped, smoothed and re-energised for a healthy and youthful glow. Suitable for all skin tones and types.
all_ingreds:
Wavelength Call Out:
                          Red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm are the most clinically-proven wavelengths for skin health and rejuvenation, with 830nm achieving the quickest results and client satisfaction.
                          Shorter wavelengths such as green, yellow and purple penetrate poorly and are absorbed by melanin and superficial blood. They will not reach the dermis where the main cells for healing and rejuvenation are located, and therefore will not stimulate the production of collagen and elastin.
                          Longer wavelengths such as red 633nm and near-infrared 830nm penetrate well into the skin and reach the dermis – not only do they stimulate collagen and elastin production (rejuvenating the complexion), they also penetrate deep into the body, reaching muscles, nerves and bone, increasing blood flow and targeting inflammation whilst supporting cellular regrowth and regeneration to help reduce pain and heal injuries.

name: 111SKIN Meso Infusion Overnight Micro Mask Single 0.56 oz
product_description: The Meso Micro Mask uses innovative technology that provides 100% product absorption. Each patch is made up of 150 micro cones of pure Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C. The skin is a barrier, and when healthy should keep external elements out to protect itself against irritation. This means when a skincare product is applied, only a percentage of that product is actually absorbed. The Micro Masks are made from micro cones that physically penetrate the skin at 0.3mm. Once applied, the mask will dissolve into the target area overnight to infuse the skin with 100% of the pure, two-ingredient formula. Recommended for use under the eyes, on crow’s feet, frown lines or nasolabial folds – the user is free to choose which areas to target. Usage results in the diminished appearance of lines and wrinkles, and plumper-feeling, brighter looking skin.

name: Revision Skincare Revox™ Line Relaxer 0.68 fl. oz.
product_description: Revox™ Line Relaxer is an advanced, targeted serum specifically formulated to work synergistically with a neuromodulator. This breakthrough formula utilizes patent-pending technology to not only help optimize in-office treatments but also to deliver clinically-proven benefits on its own. While Revox™ Line Relaxer and neuromodulator injections have the same objective – to visibly reduce expression lines – they work in different ways. Revox™ Line Relaxer utilizes LineRelax™ Technology featuring five potent peptides plus Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) to deliver dramatic results that go beyond what ordinary serums can offer. This innovative technology provides a topical infusion of benefits that helps minimize the impact of facial expressions that cause horizontal and vertical lines to appear, including forehead and glabellar lines, crow’s feet and under-eye lines, nasolabial folds, marionette and vertical lip lines. In addition, Revox Line Relaxer™ contains a Dermal Support Blend of three specialized peptides plus two highly efficacious botanical extracts to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and improve the look of skin elasticity. This robust formula also provides other essential benefits that can significantly improve overall skin appearance.
